news.title: MTV VMAs 2025: Watch All of the Performances
news.summary: Mariah Carey, Sabrina Carpenter, Doja Cat and others performed at Long Island’s UBS Arena

news.summary: Who won Video of the Year, Artist of the Year, and Best New Artist? Check here for the full list.

news.title: Yungblud and Aerosmith’s Steven Tyler Pay Tribute to Ozzy Osbourne at 2025 MTV Video Music Awards: Watch
news.summary: Joe Perry and Extreme’s Nuno Bettencourt also took part in the segment

news.title: Watch Lady Gaga Perform “Abracadabra” and “The Dead Dance” at 2025 MTV VMAs
news.summary: With a total of 12 nods, the pop star is the evening’s most nominated artist

news.title: Mariah Carey Delivers Career-Spanning Video Vanguard Medley at 2025 MTV VMAs: Watch
news.summary: The elusive chanteuse sang “Fantasy,” “Obsessed,” “We Belong Together,” and more

news.title: Watch Sabrina Carpenter Perform “Tears” at 2025 MTV VMAs
news.summary: On the heels of releasing Man’s Best Friend last week, she delivered another winking pop production

news.title: Watch Doja Cat Perform “Jealous Type” at 2025 MTV VMAs
news.summary: She gave the lead single from her forthcoming album Vie its live debut—with an assist from Kenny G
